content:
In bumping mathlib to the recent nightly, the recently-added check that binop%s in patterns have [match_pattern] caused some breakage, and revealed that we can't match on x * y because Mul.mul does not have [match_pattern].

Should the basic binary operators in Init.Prelude like HMul.hMul, Mul.mul, etc. receive [match_pattern]? If so, which ones?
